files.description: Documents the /outputs artifact contract including folder purpose, naming conventions, artifact rules, and how the CLI tool should write and update outputs safely.
Maintains versioned, cycle-based changelog entries for the /outputs artifacts and structure, updated immediately when outputs are created or modified.
Defines what belongs in /outputs/meta_analysis, expected file formats, and minimal metadata requirements for generated analyses.
Defines what belongs in /outputs/taxonomy, expected taxonomy schema conventions, and how updates should be recorded in the changelog.
Describes tooling-related output artifacts, how they are generated by the CLI, and the standards for reproducibility and traceability.
Package initializer for the cli_tool implementation exposing the version and high-level entry points used by the CLI.
Implements a Python CLI command to scaffold /outputs core folders and write/update /outputs/README.md and /outputs/CHANGELOG.md with cycle-based entries.
Provides utilities to create and append deterministic, cycle-stamped changelog entries and to ensure the changelog format remains valid Markdown.
Contains filesystem scaffolding logic to create required /outputs directories and README files idempotently while respecting artifact rules.
Defines project metadata, dependencies, and a console script entry point for running the cli_tool from the command line.

missionDescription: Create /outputs/README.md (artifact rules), /outputs/CHANGELOG.md (versioned entries per cycle), and core folders (e.g., /outputs/meta_analysis/, /outputs/taxonomy/, /outputs/tooling/) and commit/update changelog immediately.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Directly fixes the current blocking constraint (no artifacts created) by establishing a standardized /outputs scaffold (README + folder structure + changelog). This enables consistent execution-first ...
projectName: /outputs/README.md (artifact rules), /outputs/CHANGELOG.md (versioned entries per cycle), and core folders (e.g., /outputs/meta_analysis/, /outputs/taxonomy/, /outputs/tooling/) and commit/update changelog immediately.
